duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the Store Manager with the operation of the store to maximize profitability.
Lead associates through the execution of company objectives to drive sales, prevent shrink, and provide a superior customer experience.
Receive merchandise deliveries, and coach and develop the team to demonstrate and encourage company core values.
Conduct regular counts to ensure accurate perpetual inventory and manually order products to meet customer needs.
Analyze operating reports and make recommendations for improvement, as well as utilize scheduling software to complete the associate work schedule.
Ensure the store opens and closes at the appropriate time, and that proper procedures are followed for cash transactions and bank deposits.

education_certification.credential: H.S. Diploma or General Education Degree (GED) required.
